graph.description: This graph's nodes are the SAE features that are active (i.e., whose activation is 0.5 or higher) on the final token of the prompt. Its edges represent the similarity values of the pearson_correlation measure, computed over 10M tokens with activation threshold None (absolute values below 0.1 are clamped to zero). The explanations of the features are created by GPT-3.5-turbo and downloaded from Neuronpedia.
graph.prompt: When Mary and John went to the store, John gave a drink to

nodes.explanation: mentions of the ability or potential to complete a specific action or task
mentions of political and military actions, particularly related to strikes and attacks
words related to legal actions and processes
the word "to" followed by a verb in the infinitive form
words related to providing solutions or relief
phrases related to the concept of bringing something to a place or group of people
phrases related to giving or donating something to others
phrases related to completing tasks or achieving goals
words related to geographical locations
instances of transferring or giving something to someone or something
phrases related to the action of giving something to someone
descriptions of food items and beverages
words related to actions and interactions between people
phrases related to awarding or providing something to someone or some entity
phrases related to physical actions involving hands
organizations or entities along with related actions or events connected to them
mentions of food, beverages, and snacks
specific mentions of food and dietary habits
prepositions
references to gardening and outdoor activities
phrases related to medical treatments and procedures
